#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <map>

using namespace std;

map<long long, int> ar;

void pre()
{
        for(long long i = 2; i <= 1000000LL; i++) {
            long long val = i*i;
            for(long long j = 2; j <= (double)log(10000000000000000LL)/(double)log(i); j++) {
                ar[val] = 1;
                val = val * i;
                //cout << val << endl;
            }
        }
}

int main()
{
    int t;
     pre();
    cin >> t;
    while(t--) {
        long long num;

        cin >> num;

        if(ar[num]) cout << "YES" << endl;
        else {
            long long val = sqrt(num);
            if(val*val == num) {
                cout << "YES" << endl;
            }
            else {
                cout << "NO" << endl;
            }
        }
    }
}
